attributes.action: Freedom for unvaccinated patients to undergo fertility treatment
attributes.additional_details: We believe making vaccination a condition of fertility treatment undermines the principle of informed consent. All British people should have the right to bodily autonomy and must never be coerced into receiving a medical intervention they may not want, in order to proceed with interventions that they may need.
attributes.background: Make it illegal to mandate vaccination as a compulsory action for fertility patients. This should apply to the public and private clinics.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.  We're not aware of any proposals from the Government to require fertility patients to be vaccinated. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
